    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Dissolving salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auflösendes Salz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sel de dissolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sal dissolvendo-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sale di dissoluzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλύοντας άλας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sal que disuelve</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what happens to the particles of a salt crystal (red) when it is dissolved in water (blue).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solvent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was den Partikeln eines 
Salzkristalles geschieht (rot) wenn er im Wasser aufgelöst wird 
(blau).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre ce qui arrive aux 
particules d'un cristal de sel (rouge) quand il est dissous dans l'eau
(bleue).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o que acontece às 
partículas de um cristal de sal (vermelho) quando é dissolvido na 
água (azul).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che cosa accade alle 
particelle di un cristallo del sale (rosso) quando è dissolto in 
acqua (blu).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τι συμβαίνει στα μόρια 
ενός αλατισμένου κρυστάλλου (κόκκινου) όταν διαλύεται στο ύδωρ 
(μπλε).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué sucede a las 
partículas de un cristal de la sal (rojo) cuando se disuelve en el 
agua (azul).</string>
          </description>
